name: The Jumping Fox
description:
Fox Jumper: Mario type platformer game where you need to defeat enemies and collect cherries, while traversing across the landscape. 

This is my first unity game, still in prototype stage, I'm planning to update the game, as I improve my skills, and I thought making a game would be a good way to do it. 

Please, comment any bugs, suggestions you may have, as it will help me alot. Thanks
